name: Thirukkural
author: Roghithsam

Key Features

  • Simple shortcode ‘[Tamil_Thirukkural]’ available to display random quotes.

  • Facility to extend and modify the functionality of the plugin using WordPress filters.
sections.installation:
Follow the steps to install the plugin:
1. Download the zip file.
2. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly by searching “Thirukkural” plugin.
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
4. Enjoy! üòÄ

After installing the plugin, Navigate to Appearance -> Widget and then add the widget “Tamil Thirukkural”.
Random Quotes will be displayed in the website as per your widget/Theme settings.
sections.faq:
How many Kurals are added?

All 1330 kurals are added.

I have a suggestion. How do I contact you?

The best way to contact me is through the support forums.
